quote: You can grow your business with an iPhone. Not only can you today, that's better than the other stuff.
why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable insight that dispels a common myth about needing expensive equipment.
suggested_hook: Think you need expensive gear for great video content? Think again!

quote: Get out of model mode... into teacher mode. Think about who you're helping and who you're serving.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to focus on providing value rather than worrying about appearance.
suggested_hook: Stop worrying about how you look on camera!
